project_descr: The Malawi National Registration and Identification System (NRIS) project - to contribute to Government’s efforts to guarantee the fundamental right to identity, entitlement and enjoyment of full citizenship in Malawi.

outputs.output_descr: The project will seek to build capacity to establish and operate a national registration and identification system and register eligible Malawian citizens in the National Register and issue them with National ID cards.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

project_title: malawi national registration and identification system
